name: WebUtils
documentation:
Utility methods for working with web request and response data, including cookies, headers, and handler annotations.

This class supports parsing and formatting of HTTP cookie headers, case-insensitive HTTP header maps, and discovery of {@link WebPattern} annotations on handler methods annotated with {@link HandleWeb}.

methods.name: asHeaderMap
concatenateUrlParts
emptyHeaderMap
methods.documentation:
Returns a new case-insensitive header map, with keys compared ignoring case.

 @return an empty case-insensitive {@code Map} for headers

methods.name: extractPathParameters
getHandlerPath
methods.documentation:
Computes the complete {@link Path @Path} value for the given handler. {@code targetClass} is required; {@code handler} and {@code method} are not. The path value is determined by inspecting the following elements:
  • sub-packages
  • class package
  • target class
  • handler properties (if the given handler is not null)
  • handler method (if the given method is not null)

{@code @Path} values are joined together in the order listed above, with a slash as delimiter. If any of the {@code @Path} values start with a slash, the chain is reset.

methods.name: getHeader
methods.documentation: Retrieves the first header value for the given name from the provided Metadata object.

methods.name: getHeaders
methods.documentation: Retrieves a case-insensitive map of headers from the provided Metadata object.

methods.name: getWebPatterns
hasPathParameter
methods.documentation: Checks if the given path contains a named path parameter.
